TrcCommonLib.trclib

Class TrcOpenCvDetector<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcCommonLib.trclib.TrcOpenCvDetector<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - specifies the type of the detected objects.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrcVisionTask.VisionProcessor<Mat,O>

    public abstract class TrcOpenCvDetector<O>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrcVisionTask.VisionProcessor<Mat,O>
    This class implements a generic OpenCV detector. Typically, it is extended by a specific detector that provides the algorithm to process an image for detecting objects using OpenCV APIs.

                         TrcVideoSource<Mat> videoSource,
                         int numImageBuffers,
                         O[] detectedObjectBuffers)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        instanceName - specifies the instance name.
        videoSource - specifies the video source.
        numImageBuffers - specifies the number of image buffers to allocate.
        detectedObjectBuffers - specifies the array of preallocated detected object buffers.

      • drawRectangles

        public void drawRectangles(Mat image,
                           Rect[] detectedObjectRects,
                           Scalar color,
                           int thickness)
        This method is called to overlay rectangles on an image to the video output.
        Parameters:
        image - specifies the frame to be rendered to the video output.
        detectedObjectRects - specifies the detected object rectangles.
        color - specifies the color of the rectangle outline.
        thickness - specifies the thickness of the rectangle outline.

      • grabFrame

        public boolean grabFrame(Mat image)
        This method is called to grab an image frame from the video input.
        Specified by:
        grabFrame in interface TrcVisionTask.VisionProcessor<Mat,O>
        Parameters:
        image - specifies the frame buffer to hold the captured image.
        Returns:
        true if frame is successfully captured, false otherwise.
